Call and Mesaages Notificatio: Smart watch for android phones will vibrate to remind you when your smartphone receives call notification, SMS and APP messages (WhatsAPP, Facebook, Messenger, Instagram) so you don't miss every message.

1.69 Inch Full Touch Screen: This smart watch for android compatible features a 1.69 inch TFT-LCD color display for outstanding HD quality. Zinc alloy case and silicone strap, make you more comfortable to wear. You can choose from140 + personalized watch faces, or set your favorite photo from your phone as a watch face.

24 Hours Health Monitoring: This smart watch for man women features real-time heart rate monitoring,pressure monitoring, exercise recording and sleep monitoring, accurately records all-day activities such as steps, calories burned a fitness watch to monitor your health at all times.

IP68 Waterproof: This activity trackers and smartwatche is designed with IP68 waterproof rating, so you can have no worries when washing your hands or swimming in the pool.At the same time, this fitness trackers for women man has 8 sports modes include walking, running. cycling, skipping, badminton, basketball, football, swimming.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hear Rate Android smart watch with the latest built-in heart rate sensor, can effectively accurate measure your heart rate. Meaning you can know of pulse rate changes in real time. Blood oxygen Digital watch with the latest built-in sensor, you can measure and see how much oxygen is in your blood. Check your health status at any time. Music Control Find and turn on music controls in your fitness watch for quick and easy control of your music (play/pause, next/previous song) during training sessions.

Sleep Quality Monitoring The mans womens smart watch can automatically monitor and analyze your sleep quality in real time 24 hours a day, and accurately monitor the sleep situation for nearly 7 days. Customize You Watch Face 1.69″ touch touchscreen, you can customize the watch face to enjoy a variety of cool watch faces. You can even customize the watch face based on your own photos or favorite pictures. IP68 Waterproof Waterproof watch is an IP68 waterproof standard, You can wear it while washing your hands or in the shower, or even while swimming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great watch for fitness freak. Very good battery life. Really looks good and very handy. Very handy features. Good value for money. I would recommend this product to fitness friendly person.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up ! Sleep monitor is a little iffy (sometimes doesn't even register I got any sleep). Worst thing is that the recharge posts on the back of the watch give me a rash : ( which is odd because I have a dozen other watches with all metal backs that don't bother me . It does not bother the wife's skin though so maybe just me ?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this smart watch to measure my daily activities and receive notifications from my smartphone. I am very happy with this product which is easy to use and sync with my phone. The watch is light and comfortable to wear. The screen is bright and touch-sensitive. The battery lasts several days without any problem. The health, sleep, heart rate and step tracking functions are accurate and motivating. The notifications are readable and convenient. I can also control the music and camera of my phone from the watch. I think this smart watch has a great value for money and I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Basic Smart Watch With Amazing Battery Life
reviews.reviewText: I've had an Apple Watch in the past but only really used a handful of features. If you want a watch that has specific app compatibility, this may not be it. But for what it DOES do, it does very well. I love the watch face/background gallery. The standard band is comfortable to wear and has more space than standard Apple Watch bands. Battery life is out of this world. With an Apple Watch, I had to charge it daily and could never use the sleep tracking functions because it had to sit on the charger all night. In comparison, this watch only uses about 10% per day. I popped it on the charger after about 5 days and it was fully charged again in under an hour. Would definitely recommend if you're looking for an intro smart watch or want a watch but know you won't use enough features to justify a $350 Apple Watch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not very Accurate
reviews.reviewText: For the most part it's a good watch. But the heart rate, blood pressure and oxygen level are Not very Accurate. I have to turn the watch off and check a second and third time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seems quite accurate
reviews.reviewText: Battery lasts more than 2 weeks. Bpm and BP seem very accurate. I’m satisfied

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not exactly great ... BUT YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR.
reviews.reviewText: (Now let me preface this review with item arrived as described etc.) However, I ordered this little guy for my kid for his birthday. Big disappointment. The watch is app driven. Works off bluetooth connection. Which I am sure that if we were to ever get the watch to connect to the app may have been the ideal choice. Alas, we could not ... we could not on several versions of devices. Although the APP is readily available on both Google Play and the Apple App Store. Regardless, the app could never find the watch. (SIDE NOTE: there is not a lot of features directly built into the watch) We tried scanning the QR code. App picked up the code but refused to connect ... again on several versions of phones and devices. My first thought was well at that price point could I really expect more? So I thought well if we can at least get the correct time set on the watch it may be fine. Well guess what? There is no way to set the time on the watch ... AT LEAST THAT I COULD FIND ... I have to allow for operator error here. The documentation that came with the unit was sparse. Troubleshooting page was not much help. Since it was a birthday gift I felt bad and ordered another brand. On the upside once the battery is charged it goes like gangbusters. So there is that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars overall good except for one function
reviews.reviewText: This watch works well with many functions such as step count, blood pressure, pulse etc. However, the tracking of sleeping quality sometimes was inaccurate. I noticed sometimes the daily sleeping hours and wake-up time were wrong. But the main functions I always use daily work fine.
